text: CNN en Español is a Pan-American Spanish-language news channel, owned by CNN Worldwide, a news division for Warner Bros. Discovery. It was launched on pay television, on March 17, 1997. ==References== ==Other websites== * *CNNExpansion *CNN en Español on XM *Main CNN Site Category:CNN Category:Television channels in North America Category:Spanish language Category:1997 establishments in the United States
title: CNN en Español
